text:
@realDonaldTrump 1,601,035 cases of #COVID19 in the #USA & a minimum of 95,304 #American deaths. 

#Trump's leadership throughout the #pandemic is deplorable & embarrassing. He made a total ass out of himself & people died!! That evil man is full of anger/hatred & wreaks of a crudded up soul 🐍
